basicInfo.name: Rin
basicInfo.flavor: Mir once disappeared for a hundred days. When he returned, he had become the emperor of dragons and was completely transformed.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Confusion. [Lasts for: 1 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Confusion chance becomes 50%.

Skill 1.name: Dragon's Descent
Skill 1.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 62% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional damage equal to 37% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Adds Damage: Each attack deals additional damage equal to 37% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Resets the cooldown of [Dragon's Descent] upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.

Skill 2.name: Dragon's Wrath
Skill 2.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 70% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional damage equal to 30% of Magic Attack when the target's current HP is 50% or higher.
 - 100% chance to inflict Confusion. [Lasts for: 2 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Damage: When the target's current HP is 50% or higher, each attack deals damage equal to 42% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Crimson Scales
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 67% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Attack-Based Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Attack-Based Crit Rate max becomes 33%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 100%.
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Nullification upon revival. [Ends After: Taking 2 Hit(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Karma, Mir, Pascal, bibimbap, seasoned greens, green tea, peace, order, manners, flying, rain, ponds
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Miho, Sun Wukong, mushrooms, war, chaos, rudeness, being scared, walking, strong sunlight
profile.story: Mir once disappeared for a hundred days. When he returned, he had become the emperor of dragons and was completely transformed.

basicInfo.name: Rin
basicInfo.flavor: When Rin entered the palace as a princess, she was accompanied by her favorite dragon, Mir. Thus, the royal officials call her Mir's Master.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Confusion. [Lasts for: 1 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Dragon's Descent
Skill 1.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 57% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 57% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Dragon's Wrath
Skill 2.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 62% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional damage equal to 27% of Magic Attack when the target's current HP is 50% or higher.
 - 100% chance to inflict Confusion. [Lasts for: 1 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 62% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Crimson Scales
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 60% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 61% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Attack-Based Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 61% of Physical Attack.

profile.story: When Rin entered the palace as a princess, she was accompanied by her favorite dragon, Mir. Thus, the royal officials call her Mir's Master.

basicInfo.name: Rin
basicInfo.flavor: Rin is the daughter of a noble family living at the Endless Rampart. She's your typical girl, except for the fact that she's friendly with dragons. This caught the eye of the emperor, and she was adopted into the royal family.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Confusion. [Lasts for: 1 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Dragon's Descent
Skill 1.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 52% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Dragon's Wrath
Skill 2.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 57% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack deals additional damage equal to 25% of Magic Attack when the target's current HP is 50% or higher.
 - 100% chance to inflict Confusion. [Lasts for: 1 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 57% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Crimson Scales
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 40% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 55% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Attack-Based Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 55% of Physical Attack.
